name: Flo OG
description: Flo OG is a sweet indica-dominant strain with creative effects. Known as a functional indica, Flo OG combines the quality genetics of Flo (by DJ Short) and Rare Dankness #1 (from Rare Dankness Seeds) to create a strain that stimulates the mind while going easy on the body. This strain’s hazy euphoria takes effect immediately as the body buzzes with a gentle relaxing warmth. Enjoy Flo OG to improve mood, curb depression, and promote rest (in higher doses).
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Focused, Creative, Pain, Stress, Inflammation, Fatigue, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
